Gladkovskii_, Oct 17 2012From _Vladimir Reshetnikov_, Oct 27 2015: (Start)a(n) = Re((-i)^n*hypergeom([1,-n], [], i)).a(n) = (-1)^n*(cos(1)*(n+2)!+cos(Pi*n/2)*hypergeom([1], [n/2+2,(n+3)/2], -1/4)+sin(Pi*n/2)*(n+2)*hypergeom([1], [n/2+1,(n+3)/2], -1/4))/(n^2+3*n+2).a(n) = (-1)^n*Re(Gamma(n+1, i)*exp(i)) = (-1)^n*(Gamma(n+1, i)*exp(i)+Gamma(n+1, -i)*exp(-i))/2, where Gamma(a, x) is the upper incomplete Gamma function, i=sqrt(-1).Gamma(n+1, i) = exp(-i)*((-1)^n*a(n) + A009551(n)*i).Recurrence: a(0) = 1, a(1) = -1, a(2) = 1, a(n+3) = -(n+3)*a(n+2)-a(n+1)-(n+1)*a(n). (End)
